meanings.sent1: The linteled doorway was sturdy and strong.
meanings.sent2: The linteled archway added a classic touch to the building.
meanings.sent3: The linteled entrance made the house look very official.
meanings.sent4: The linteled structure stood out among the other buildings.
meanings.sent5: The linteled roof provided a sense of security and protection.

meanings.definition: Provided with a lintel or lintels.
meanings.sent1: The linteled windows allowed plenty of light into the room.
meanings.sent2: The linteled walls supported the weight of the upper floors.
meanings.sent3: The linteled ceiling made the room feel cozy and safe.
meanings.sent4: The linteled beams added character to the old house.
meanings.sent5: The linteled structure gave the building a unique look.
